title: Hextech Repair Tool
body: Hello i will make it short and clear. I can't install HRT. While installing it occurs an error about d3dcompiler_47.dll that cant be installed.

replies.body:
It seems this may be caused by missing DirectX assets that the HRT relies on. I recommend running the [DirectX web installer](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?displayLang=en&id=35) before trying to install the HRT again.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
Okey this time i could install it, but i had some reports about troyans from my 360 total security.

And now i have new problem. There is no way i can run it as admin. I just have no option like that. On top of that i can't do it in properties as i have in "choose the advanced propertied you want for this shortcut" all option grey. Can't click on anything. 

* And ofc i can do it with other aps.

The HRT desktop shortcut created upon install cannot be run as admin. You'll have to go into the install directory **C:\Program Files (x86)\Hextech Repair Tool** then run the shortcut inside the folder as admin.

If that worked, let me know!

Okey it worked. I'm sad tho that HRT stil is not helping me to solve problems with lol. Looking at logs everything is fine (as much as i can say it) but oh well. Maybe those random fps drops will stop as it only was happening twice from yesterday for around 4 hours each day.

FPS drops can definitely be really frustrating! If you do happen to still see these issues, I definitely recommend checking out our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
